policy.title: Privacy Policyâ€‹
policy.i1: Fernando Rivera Applications, include: GoMed, Mira Honduras, The Vine Centre, iFootSchedule, Checkstudents and BetterLists.
policy.i2: Fernando Rivera Applications, does not collect any personal data from users.
policy.i3: Fernando Rivera Applications, does not log IP addresses.
policy.i4: Fernando Rivera Applications, does not access the contact data of the device.
policy.i5: Fernando Rivera Applications, does not access users' email accounts.
policy.i6: Fernando Rivera Applications, does not save data related to the device.
policy.i7: Fernando Rivera Applications, with the exception of GoMed, does not collect information about your real location, GoMed does, but it does not store or keep it for any purpose, except for a last record in which the last position is stored at the time of closing the application with in order to speed up the future location on the next power-up.
policy.i8: Fernando Rivera Applications, not Apple or Google, is solely responsible for the content of Fernando Rivera (Bittech) applications.
policy.i9: Fernando Rivera Applications, not Apple or Google, offers technical support via email
policy.msg: For more information about this privacy policy, you can contact me by email
